CAT.STRING: Take on the nation power of this nation for one battle.
Build a Wonder from this Age in any occupied territory.
Make any occupied territory invulnerable to attack.
Destroy the defense of a territory protected by the 'Fortify' bonus.
Start one battle with extra technology.
Receive a 5% boost in production for this resource in one battle.
Begin one battle with extra troops.
Gain a non-capital, non-fortified territory without a fight.
All research in the next battle is 20% faster and 20% cheaper.
Goods at the Market are 20% cheaper to buy and earn 20% more when sold during one battle.
Units heal 50% faster and are immune to attrition damage during one battle.
Invading enemy troops take 50% more attrition damage during one battle.
Enemy tribes are deprived of their nation powers for one battle.
Enemy tribes gain no benefit from their strategic resources in one battle.
Gain the use of the enemy nation power for one battle.
Start one battle with bonus +$NUM0 of each resource. The amount depends on your performance in a Barbarian battle.
Make any occupied non-capital territory invulnerable to attack.
Reduce the territory strength of an enemy territory by two levels.
Reduce the territory strength of an enemy territory by two levels.
Gain any non-capital territory without a fight. Target territory must be adjacent to your nation and have a strength of four or lower.
Start one battle with bonus +$NUM0 of each resource. The amount depends on the number of your troops that survive a Field Battle or Tactics scenario.
Gain this nation's special powers for one battle.
Enemy nations are deprived of their nation powers for one battle.
Enemy nations gain no benefit from their strategic resources in one battle.
Build a Wonder from this Age or an earlier Age in any occupied territory.
Units heal 100% faster and are immune to attrition damage during one battle.
Local Area Network or Direct Internet
The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital to win.
Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers to achieve victory.
You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital to force them to withdraw.
Expecting no resistance to your invasion, no support troops were included in your expeditionary force. A small barbarian nation has been encountered, however, and must be eliminated.
Your army has reached the largest barbarian settlement in this territory. Capture the city and the territory will fall. The barbarian leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the barbarian troops.
Your armies encountered no resistance in taking the province. However, the natives have rallied and are assaulting your new outpost. Survive until the timer expires to win.
The enemy has mustered their troops to meet yours in the field. Destroy their army to win the scenario. Be sure to protect your general.
There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. However, they are sure to join your empire if you prove your dominance in the area by taking territory from the barbarians.
There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. Use your diplomatic skills to play them off of each other and ensure your own dominance in the area.
Drive the barbarians from your homeland to found your new nation.
The barbarians in this territory are hostile and must be eliminated. Defeat them by capturing their capitals or capturing most of their territory.
The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities.

A group of barbarian tribes in this region have united together to destroy you. Fortunately you brought extra supplies and the barbarians are an age behind you. Survive until the timer expires to win.
Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Find their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.
Expecting no resistance to your invasion, no support troops were included in your expeditionary force. A fortified city has been encountered, however, and must be eliminated.
The enemy has found your army's encampment. Protect your buildings and destroy their army to win the scenario. If the enemy destroys your buildings, you will lose.
Your army is approaching a barbarian army. Find their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.
Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the city and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.
Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.
Your army is approaching a barbarian army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.
Your armies encountered no resistance in taking the territory. However, the natives have rallied and are assaulting your new outpost. Survive until the timer expires to win.
Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers and defend your capital to achieve victory.
Your armies encountered no resistance in taking the territory. However, the natives have rallied and are assaulting your new outpost. Defend your capital until the timer expires to win.

A group of barbarian tribes in this region have united together to destroy you. Fortunately you brought extra supplies and the barbarians are an Age behind you. Survive until the timer expires to win.

The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities. They must capture your capital to defeat you.
Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the capital and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.
The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.
You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw.
The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.
You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital(s) or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw.

The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities in $NUM0 minutes. They must capture your capital to defeat you.

Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the capital in 120 minutes and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.
The barbarians in this territory are hostile and must be eliminated. Defeat them by capturing their capitals or capturing most of their territory in $NUM0 minutes.

There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. Use your diplomatic skills to play them off of each other and ensure your own dominance in the area. Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.
Hold off the enemy for 15 minutes.
Find and capture the enemy's capital.
Capture the enemy capital or defeat them by capturing territory.
Capture one city from each nation to defeat them.
Hold off the enemy for 30 minutes.
Hold off the enemy until the timer expires.
Capture the enemy capital in $NUM0 minutes.
Capture the enemy capital or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
Capture the enemy capital(s) or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
Find and capture the enemy's capital in 120 minutes.
Capture the enemy capital or defeat them by capturing territory in $NUM0 minutes.
Capture one city from each nation to defeat them in $NUM0 minutes.
Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.

The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities.
There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. Use your diplomatic skills to play them off of each other and ensure your own dominance in the area.

A group of barbarian tribes in this region have united together to destroy you. Fortunately you brought extra supplies and the barbarians are an Age behind you. Survive until the timer expires to win.
Use trigger functions from (see list by selecting Edit->Insert Trigger Function) to control game events
Insert commands that will execute when trigger condition is true and the trigger is enabled.
conditions under which the trigger will fire
Use Edit->Insert Trigger Block to add a blank trigger block.

Add triggers and other commands to be executed each game frame here.
